divs: Sighting Detailsi was going to get a soda and i looked out the window and i something brighter than a star i that it was a alien aircraft it moved side to side than raised so i grabbed my binoculars to get a closer look at it and it did nothing than when i put the binoculars down it started to move again i felt brave i text-ed my friend say i just saw a UFO ilast sight of it when it flew towards the strip
